item.title: Lessons Learned from the Health Journey of a Cancer Survivor and Caregiver
item.description: With each specialist who walked in the room and made us repeat his story, I bluntly and emotionally asked them: Didnt you read his chart? Didnt you talk to the other physicians? Read on himss.org
